column1: Local Foods////Went back here again for lunch
column2: busy as usual. Parking wasn't too bad this time
column3: as we got a spot in the lot. I tried the Banh mi sandwich
column4: probably one of the biggest ones I've had! Classic ingredients and flavors spot on. More fixings than your typical Banh mi
column5: which made it even more delicious. No complaints here! Will be back to try more menu items.
